pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lattice Options and Add-ins (loa) // Various plots and functions that make use of the lattice/trellis plotting framework. The plots (which include loaPlot, GoogleMap and trianglePlot) use panelPal, a function that extends lattice and hexbin package methods to automate plot subscripting and panel-to-panel and panel-to-key synchronization/management. See ?loa for further details.
